price: Na unda jahazi mbele ya macho yetu na kwa mujibu wa ufunuo wetu. Wala usinisemeze kuwatetea walio dhulumu. Kwani hao bila ya shaka watazamishwa.
arabic: وَٱصۡنَعِ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا وَوَحۡيِنَا وَلَا تُخَٰطِبۡنِي فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِنَّهُم مُّغۡرَقُونَ
footnotes: Tukamwambia: Tengeneza chombo chini ya uangalizi na ulinzi wetu, wala usinisemeze kwa ajili  ya hawa madhaalimu, kwa sababu nilikwisha itikia ombi lako, na nimekwisha amrisha wateketezwe kwa kuzamishwa. Tazama Aya 27 Surat Al Muuminun (23).

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'naʿi al-ful'ka bi-aʿyuninā wawaḥyinā walā tukhāṭib'nī fī alladhīna ẓalamū innahum mugh'raqūna
